_sText:
*** IMPORTANT ***

This is a Beta so Expect Bugs 

If you find a bug report it in the feedback section thx in advance



***CREDITS***

Thanks to "Grape-shoot" for his fantastic Helicopter (to which i've resized to match the size i needed)

*** THEME ***
Both Teams Start on Opposite boats you have to make your way to the Oil rig, or just try an camp the bridge of the small boat you start on
Well the theme is really simple, you are on an oil rig and you must survive there are a couple of spots around the map to barricade yourself and also

**WARNING**
Anybody who goes in the water will be pulled down, this is not a bug and is actually part of the design to simulate rough water


*** KNOWN BUGS ***

Missing Texture on 1 of the walkways under the rig
